body.name: Mini mop, Mini mop Portable self squeezes Small mop,self Squeezing Mini mop, Suitable for Kitchens, bathrooms, Living Rooms, Cars Portable Mini mop (2 Cotton Heads+1 Squeeze Handle)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 32 mins
features: 【 High quality Material 】 The mini mop adopts high-quality gold-plated material and polishing process; Self squeeze mini mop uses PVC ecological sponge, which can clean various stains and has strong adsorption ability for small dust and particles.

【You know！】Portable mini mopinstallation/disassembly tutorial (see Figure 2); Please note that if left idle for a long time, ecological sponges will become hard; Solution - Simply immerse the mop cotton in water and quickly restore softness within 3 seconds.

【 No wash hand push-pull design 】 All in one mini cleaning mop adopts a circular push-pull design, which refuses hand washing and can be used with one hand; Save time and energy, improve cleaning efficiency.

【 Stronger water absorption 】 Self squeeze mini mop uses high-quality ecological sponge, which is soft and delicate, and has stronger water absorption; Effectively remove stains without wearing the surface; The detachable mini portable mop is easy to clean and manage, and can be replaced when needed to ensure long-term use. (You can get 2 ecological sponges)

【 Multi purpose 】 Mini mop for small spaces can rotate 60 °, easy to operate, solve stains without residue; Self squeezing mini mop with a stretching length of 11.6 inches, 210G; Small volume; Lightweight, crucial for automotive use; Clean glass and tidy interior will bring you a pleasant driving experience!

【 Application Scenario 】 Mini mop portable self-service small mop suspension design, easily solves the problem of cotton head stains, is easy to store, does not take up space, and can quickly locate dirt on counters, windows, floors, kitchens, living rooms, and bathrooms without any trouble!
body.description: Product name: mini mopProduct features: dry and wet dual use+no hand washing, can be hung+can standProduct features: unique design+easy to carryProduct size: when folded up (9.76 * 1.81 inches) when extended (11.6 * 6.1 inches)Product weight: 6.87 ouncesProduct List: (2 cotton heads+1 extrusion handle+2 compressed dishwashing sponges)Installation of rubber cotton head: ① Hold the mop cotton head and align it with the card slot; ② Insert the right mop head into the card slot and push it forward; ③ Insert the left mop head into the card slot and push it backward (as shown in Figure ②)Dismantling the rubber cotton head: ① Lift the middle of the mop cotton head and slightly shake it to remove two clips; ② Push and lift the cotton head to the right and slightly shake it out; ③ Push and lift the other end cotton head to the left to remove the cotton head (as shown in Figure ③)Applicable scenario: Mini mop for small spaces is very suitable for various cleaning tasks, including cleaning countertops, window glass, floors, kitchens, living rooms, bathrooms, etc. Mini mop can also be used to clean the inner and outer surfaces of cars, making it a must-have tool for any car owner. It is an ideal tool for cleaning small spaces.Precautions: 1. Ensure that the card slot is correctly pushed in the installation and use (to prevent falling during use).2. Mop cotton will harden when completely dry and will not open easily. It needs to be wet, and then it will be elastic again. Two ways of use (① Remove the mop cotton after use to prevent the next use of pushing and pulling the latch) ② It is OK if it is not removed after use, but the cotton needs to be soaked in water next time)
